title: Laundry Room Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of laundry room essentials, from detergents to care labels and fabric care basics.

questions.question: What does a circle symbol on a clothing care label indicate?
Which laundry product is added during the rinse cycle to make fabrics softer and reduce static?
What is the purpose of a lint trap in a clothes dryer?
options: Catching lint and fiber debris to prevent buildup and fire hazards

questions.question: Which substance is commonly used to whiten white fabrics and disinfect laundry?
What does a square with a circle inside represent on a care label?
Which laundry item is a flat, heated metal surface used to press wrinkles out of clothing?
What is laundry bluing used for?
options: Adding a trace of blue dye to counteract yellowing in white fabrics

questions.question: Which type of detergent is specifically formulated for high-efficiency (HE) washing machines?
What is an ironing board?
options: A padded, flat surface on legs designed for pressing clothes with an iron
A folding table for sorting laundry

questions.question: Which product is sprayed on fabric before ironing to add crispness and stiffness?
What does an X through a symbol on a care label mean?
Which laundry tool is a collapsible frame used to air-dry clothes indoors?
What is OxiClean (oxygen bleach) primarily used for?
options: Removing stains and brightening laundry as a color-safe bleach alternative

questions.question: Which item is placed in the dryer to reduce static cling and add fragrance?
What is the purpose of a mesh laundry bag?
options: Protecting delicate items during machine washing
